cards.name: Premium Travel Card
cards.benefits: Airport lounge access, travel insurance, 3X miles on travel spends

cards.name: Cashback Card
cards.benefits: 5% cashback on groceries, 2% on fuel and dining

cards.name: Rewards Card
cards.benefits: Reward points on all spends, redeemable against shopping and bill payments

cards.name: Student Starter Card
cards.benefits: No annual fee, low credit limit, rewards on books and supplies

cards.name: Business Card
cards.benefits: Higher credit limit, fuel surcharge waiver, expense management features
